Y(13640) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {15697, 3545}, {631, 14269}

Y(13640) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 14893, 3832}, {2, 15689, 15705}, {4, 11539, 3839}, {30, 14269, 631}, {30, 3545, 15697}, {382, 3830, 547}, {382, 5068, 3146}, {550, 5055, 3524}, {632, 3522, 15717}, {1657, 3843, 632}, {3091, 14093, 2}, {3525, 3832, 5068}, {3526, 3830, 15687}, {5076, 15682, 15692}, {15689, 15703, 15706}

Y(13640) = Orthology center of { (1-t)*A+t*G, ...} and ABC for t=-13/15
